attributes.action: Close London Nurseries and Early Years
attributes.additional_details:
London has one of the fatest growing Covid hotspots, and the government have already recognised this by closing down primary and secondary schools. Early Years practitioners need to be considered in this decision, to further dampen the spread of this new variant. 

I propose that they are also afforded the same as all other educational sectors in London , and that their health and safety are also considered.
attributes.background: CLOSE LONDON NURSERIES AND EARLY YEARS.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566718
